metadata.Title: CVE-2017-11114 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The put_chars function in html_r.c in Twibright Links 2.14 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read) via a craftedHTML file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11114` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

links - 2.14-3
links2 - 2.14-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: links2 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.14-3').
